It is commonly used in ceramics glazes as a flux and a source of alumina and silica. Karibib Dolomite may be used in glaze recipes to adjust the thermal expansion of the glaze, reduce crazing, and enhance the overall performance of the glaze.

Wollastonite helps to lower the melting point of the glaze and improve its flow during firing. It can also contribute to the hardness, durability, and color development of the glaze when fired.
